name: Land of Entrapment
description:
An interactive fiction piece about familial obligation and immigration. Play as Elora Bejarano exploring her grandmother’s apartment. Made for Clara Fernandez-Vara's Narrative Studio using Inform 7. Spring 2018. By Emperatriz Ung. 

The basics of how to play interactive fiction: (Written by Andrew Plotkin — design by Lea Albaugh)
